accumulatedFees.description: The accumulated fees that were payed in the block.

developerFees.description: The developer fees that were accumulated in the block.

epoch.description: The epoch when the block was proposed and executed.

epochStartBlock.description: True if the current block is an epoch-start block.

nodePrice.description: EGLD amount required to run a validator.

prevEpochStartHash.description: The hash of the previous epoch start block.

prevEpochStartRound.description: The round of the previous epoch start block.

rewardsForProtocolSustainability.description: The amount of rewards for the protocol sustainability address.

rewardsPerBlock.description: The amount of EGLD rewards per block.

totalNewlyMinted.description: The amount of the newly minted EGLD.

totalToDistribute.description: The amount of EGLD that will be distributed to validators/delegators.

epochStartInfo.description: A structure that contains economic data, such as total supply.

epochStartShardsData.description: An array of structures that contains epoch-start data for each shard, such as pending miniblocks.

gasPenalized.description: The total gas that was penalized in the block.

gasProvided.description: The total gas that was provided in the block.

gasRefunded.description: The total gas that was refunded in the block.

maxGasLimit.description: The total gas that can be provided in the block.

miniBlocksDetails.description: An array of structures indicating processing details of the miniblocks, such as the index of the first processed transaction.

miniBlocksHashes.description: An array of the miniblock hashes (hexadecimal encoded) that were included in the block.

nonce.description: The sequence number of the block (block height).

notarizedBlocksHashes.description: The hashes of the blocks that were notarized in the current block.

notarizedTxsCount.description: The number of transactions that were notarized in the block.

prevHash.description: The hash of the previous block.

proposer.description: The index of the validator that proposed the block.

round.description: The round when the block was proposed and executed.

scheduledData.description: A structure that contains data about the scheduled execution.

shardId.description: The shard this block belongs to.

size.description: The size of the block in bytes.

sizeTxs.description: The size of the block's transactions in bytes.

stateRootHash.description: The trie's state root hash when the block was proposed and executed.

timestamp.description: The timestamp when the block was proposed and executed.

txCount.description: The number of transactions that were executed in the block.

validators.description: An array that contains the indices of the validators that signed the block.
